Sentencas: Ceria-rare earth solid solutions are known as solid electrolytes with potential applications in oxygen sensors and solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Lattice parameters of yttria-doped ceria solid electrolytes

Sentencas: Trivalent rare earth ions enter into solid solution introducing anion vacancies for charge compensation.
Titulo: Lattice parameters of yttria-doped ceria solid electrolytes

Sentencas: These oxygen vacancies are quite mobile at moderate temperatures giving rise to a comparatively high ionic conduction.
Titulo: Lattice parameters of yttria-doped ceria solid electrolytes

Sentencas: In this study ceria-u mol% yttria solid solutions were prepared by solid state reactions with u ranging from 0 to 12.
Titulo: Lattice parameters of yttria-doped ceria solid electrolytes

Sentencas: These solid solutions exhibit a fluorite-type structure with composition-dependent lattice parameters.
Titulo: Lattice parameters of yttria-doped ceria solid electrolytes

Sentencas: The variation of the lattice parameter was studied and correlated with existing empirical equations and with an equation based on the ion-packing model.
Titulo: Lattice parameters of yttria-doped ceria solid electrolytes

Sentencas: The effect of an effective ionic radius of Y3+ in eightfold coordination is also discussed.
Titulo: Lattice parameters of yttria-doped ceria solid electrolytes
